search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pocket (pocket.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Pocket can be found here: https://www.pocket.com/premium/ .

extracted_content.content:
Your path to ideas, inspiration, and focus.
-------------------------------------------

It’s a wild internet out there. Pocket Premium gives you a beautiful, ad-free space to absorb stories at your own pace—and keep them for however long you’d like.

Build a permanent library of everything you’ve saved

Read in a custom, ad‑free space

Find content quickly with enhanced searching & tagging

Capture ideas with unlimited highlights

Pocket

Free Account

*   Save, read, watch & listen

Save 25%

Premium

Annual Membership

$44.99/year

*   Save, read, watch & listen
*   Permanent library of everything you’ve saved
*   Suggested tags
*   Full-text search
*   Unlimited highlights
*   Premium fonts

Premium

Monthly Membership

$4.99/month

*   Save, read, watch & listen
*   Permanent library of everything you’ve saved
*   Suggested tags
*   Full-text search
*   Unlimited highlights
*   Premium fonts

### A forever home for your collection

Pocket becomes your permanent library—so even if a page you’ve saved is taken down, you’ll still have a copy of it in Pocket.

### Focused attention

A calm, ad-free reading environment gives your mind the peace and quiet it deserves.

### Stories at your fingertips

Long list? No problem. Quickly find anything you’ve saved with access to our premium search engine. Look up articles by keyword, topic, author, tag, and more.

### Smart tags

We’ll suggest tags from your list each time you save a story—the more you tag, the more helpful the suggestions become. Finding content becomes a cinch.

### Your ideas, highlighted

With unlimited highlighting in every article, you’ll have a permanent record of all those “Aha!” moments.

### Custom reading experience

Like rounder fonts, wider spacing, or condensed text? Tailor Pocket to suit your reading style with custom text settings.

Hear from current members:
--------------------------

“ Permanent library is a valuable feature for me. I work in journalism. There’s always a risk that a site will shut down with no notice and I'll lose access to something I want to read (or something I wrote!).”

Lisa, Saint Petersburg, FL

“It’s hard enough to navigate information; knowing my experience is ad-free helps me concentrate on consuming content versus finding it.”

Priyanka, Toronto, Ontario

“ I read actively on Pocket using tags and search. This allows me to go back to articles from previous months and make connections to newer articles.”

Matt, New York, NY

*   “Permanent library is a valuable feature for me. I work in journalism. There’s always a risk that a site will shut down with no notice and I'll lose access to something I want to read (or something I wrote!).”
